DOC.brief_summary: It important explore use technology reduce drinking . The purpose research study compare different type mobile technology effect alcohol drink rating usability among young adults.This study conduct four phase : web-based screening assessment ; brief appointment day alcohol drinking session ; alcohol drinking session ; follow-up appointment . Participation study last approximately two month .
DOC.brief_title: Young Adult Naturalistic Alcohol Study ( YANAS ) Using Smartphone Technology Simulated Laboratory Environment
DOC.criteria: Be able read English complete assessment Drink alcohol regularly Test positive urine test use certain illegal drug Undergraduate student enrol University Florida Graduate student College Health Human Performance University Florida Pregnant , breast feeding
